siteMetadata.title: Life with a Twist of Lemon

node.excerpt: Dear Listener, Danchez liked our last episode! Nothing to complain about. On that note we jump into a topic that we’re sure he’ll have strong opinions on. Star Wars: The Rise of Skywalker - which is said to be the conclusion of the Skywalker Saga. Jon doesn’t have tickets yet. It…

tags.name: life with a twist of lemon

node.excerpt: 1. Not having hit $1000 for Fritsche yet (Fix this. Yes - you. convenient link to donation page). 2. Netflix cancelled their Marvel shows, especially Daredevil. 3. Four star reviews on a five star scale. 4. Miracle whip. 5. BLTs with copious amounts of mayonnaise. 6. BLTs with…
